data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 353 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Poonch, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Poonch, Jammu and Kashmir, India.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Poonch, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the 353 believers in Poonch to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Poonch against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Beda people.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Poonch, Jammu and Kashmir, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Poonch, Jammu and Kashmir, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, encourage the church of Poonch, Jammu and Kashmir, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Poonch
location.people_groups_list: Gaddi (Hindu traditions), Kavoj, Sapiada, Seok, Galleban
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gaddi (Hindu traditions) (233,000), Kavoj (400), Sapiada (100), Seok (1,700), Galleban (1,300)
